text: @realDonaldTrump Americans are losing jobs because Trump failed to do HIS job. Trump has known about #COVID19 since November. We have unnecessarily lost thousands of people because of Trump's negligence. There needs to be an investigation into this malfeasance. @SpeakerPelosi @RepAdamSchiff
